Posts.Content: Hi! Thanks! and just wanted you to know my Grandfather was born in Glasgow about 1850 or so and came to US when he was 14. His last name was Macaulay. I always wanted to visit Scotland but probably never will now. I hear it is lovely there. Elaine
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: I had a stereotactic breast biopsy on Tuesday and now Saturday. They told me I have an appointment to get the results next Tuesday. Is this usual - no phone calls or anything before. I had a cluster of calcifications. Doctor said he took them all for lab. Any info would be great!
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: I am sorry. I did not mean to sound like it was the end for me. I am 67 and my husband is not well - he has COPD and maybe lung cancer. I probably woudl not travel to Scotland that is all. We love to travel but would stay here in the States. I get results of biopsy tomorrow. I will le tyou know. Elaine
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: My results were benign - no problems - just mammograms every three months or so to keep an eye on any more calcifications. Now still waiting for husband's results! Elaine
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?
